name: GUNS 'N BUBBLES
description:
Mini Jam 84
Theme: Bubbles
Limitation: You are your own ammo

Hi! , Firstly we want to thank you for visiting our game. This game is call "Guns 'N Bubbles" and it is our very first game! 🎉🎉

Our game is simple. Just stay alive and upgrade your gear with a random card when you finished a wave. BUT you need to keep an eyes for your ammo because it is also your hp ❗❗

This game is a part of Mini Jam 84: Bubbles. it's a  72-hour-long video game development event. We are two man team and started building this game from scratch in three days. 🔥🔥

Again we are thankfully for everyone that visit our game and we are looking forward to participate in a jam event again in the future 👀

(If you're experiencing a performance issue you can try downloading a ZIP version)

Controls
  • WASD : Move Around
  • Left Click : Shoot Bubbles
  • ESC : Pause
